sql.query: WITH SELECT_STEP_0 AS (SELECT * FROM join_inner), JOIN_STEP_1_RIGHT AS (SELECT * FROM orders), JOIN_STEP_1 AS (SELECT SELECT_STEP_0.ID AS ID_LEFT, SELECT_STEP_0.NAME AS NAME_LEFT, JOIN_STEP_1_RIGHT.ID AS ID_RIGHT, JOIN_STEP_1_RIGHT.CUSTOMER_ID AS CUSTOMER_ID_RIGHT, JOIN_STEP_1_RIGHT.CUSTOMER_NAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME_RIGHT FROM SELECT_STEP_0 INNER JOIN JOIN_STEP_1_RIGHT ON SELECT_STEP_0.ID = JOIN_STEP_1_RIGHT.CUSTOMER_ID) SELECT ID_LEFT, NAME_LEFT, ID_RIGHT, CUSTOMER_ID_RIGHT, CUSTOMER_NAME_RIGHT FROM JOIN_STEP_1

snowflake.query: WITH SELECT_STEP_0 AS (SELECT * FROM join_inner), JOIN_STEP_1_RIGHT AS (SELECT * FROM orders), JOIN_STEP_1 AS (SELECT SELECT_STEP_0.ID AS ID_LEFT, SELECT_STEP_0.NAME AS NAME_LEFT, JOIN_STEP_1_RIGHT.ID AS ID_RIGHT, JOIN_STEP_1_RIGHT.CUSTOMER_ID AS CUSTOMER_ID_RIGHT, JOIN_STEP_1_RIGHT.CUSTOMER_NAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME_RIGHT FROM SELECT_STEP_0 INNER JOIN JOIN_STEP_1_RIGHT ON SELECT_STEP_0.ID = JOIN_STEP_1_RIGHT.CUSTOMER_ID) SELECT ID_LEFT, NAME_LEFT, ID_RIGHT, CUSTOMER_ID_RIGHT, CUSTOMER_NAME_RIGHT FROM JOIN_STEP_1
